key.title: Key
key.description: A URL-friendly name of the resource (i.e: slug). You will be able to query later using this key instead of the id (UUID) of the resource.

organization_id.title: Organization Id
organization_id.description: Unique id of the organization that the resource belongs to.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: Unique id of the project that the resource belongs to.

environment_id.title: Environment Id
environment_id.description: Unique id of the environment that the resource belongs to.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: Date and time when the resource was created (ISO_8601 format).

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: Date and time when the resource was last updated/modified (ISO_8601 format).

urn.title: Urn
urn.description: The [URN](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uniform_Resource_Name) (Uniform Resource Name) of the resource

description.title: Description
description.description: An optional longer description of what this resource respresents in your system

actions.title: Actions
actions.description:
A actions definition block, typically contained within a resource type definition block.
        The actions represents the ways you can interact with a protected resource.

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: Attributes that each resource of this type defines, and can be used in your ABAC policies.

example.name: Repository
example.description: a git repository stored on github

contributor.description: the contributor role can only read from the repo

created.description: the time (timestamp) the repository was created

private.description: whether the repo is private (if false, the repo is public)
